After performing a long sequence of [[hand seal]]s, the user converts much of a mountainside into mud, creating a landslide that crushes everything in its path. [[Ameyuki]] used this technique to destroy [[Shangri-la]].

[[pt-br:Estilo Lama: Fundação de Lama]]
[[pl:Deiton: Jiban Deika]]
